levels.description: The ground floor is designed as a wheelchair accessible open living area that doubles as a guest reception space with easy navigation. Incorporates Art Deco finishes, geometric patterns in tiles and wall art, and natural materials like terrazzo floors and polished stone accents.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large open entrance with a reception desk area. Features Art Deco styled doorframes, decorative molding, and lighting fixtures reflecting geometric patterns. Wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with a combination of traditional and modern Art Deco elements such as chrome accents, bold geometric patterns on the upholstery, and decorative columns. Designed for social gatherings and entertainment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with accessibility in mind; lowered countertops and wide walkways. Incorporates Art Deco styling through patterned backsplash tiles and period-appropriate fixtures.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring a bar-height table for wheelchair accessibility and Art Deco decor elements like glass accents and streamlined design.

rooms.name: Service Corridor
rooms.description: Dedicated space for housekeeping and service access ensuring privacy and convenience. Equipped with wide doorways for wheelchair passage.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance door with Art Deco detailing.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace and is designed with safety railings in line with Vastu principles.

levels.description: The first floor houses private quarters with a focus on bachelor pad style. Rooms are accessorized with Art Deco accents, rich textures, and functional layouts promoting free movement for wheelchair access where possible.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom, built-in wardrobes, a workspace area, and Art Deco detailing in fixtures and decorative elements. Designed with adjustable furniture for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed with modern comforts and accessible features such as lower height beds or adjustable setups. Art Deco inspired wall treatments enhance the ambiance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom integrating Vastu principles by ensuring a good flow of energy and light. Features accessible design elements to accommodate mobility needs.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1 (En-suite)
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with waterproof finishes and accessible fixtures. Includes grab bars and a roll-in shower for ease of use.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Well-lit and spacious staircase with gradual rises for safe movement; includes an alternative ramp system in accordance with accessibility guidelines.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to a private patio area with Vastu aligned placement for optimal energy flow.

levels.description: The second floor is dedicated to additional living space, private study and recreational areas. Emphasizes Art Deco styling through the use of bold geometric patterns in furniture and fixtures while incorporating Vastu principles for enhanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet study space designed with ample natural light and comfortable seating. Features wall-mounted bookcases and Art Deco-inspired decorative elements.

rooms.name: Recreation Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room for leisure activities, including a home theater or gym area. Incorporates flexible furniture arrangements to accommodate mobility aids if needed.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Accessible staircase design with safety features including handrails and gentle inclines; alternative ramp provided.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Rooftop Terrace
openings.description: Direct access to the expansive rooftop terrace. Designed in accordance with Vastu guidelines for enhancing energy flow and relaxation.

levels.description: The rooftop terrace is a spacious, open-air area designed as a private retreat with Art Deco elements integrated into its landscaping and fixtures. Accessible via wheelchair-friendly ramps.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An expansive outdoor living space featuring a pool, seating areas, and decorative lighting. Designed with accessibility in mind including ramped access and smooth surfaces.

openings.name: Rooftop Access Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door leading to the terrace with safety railings and Vastu-aligned placement.
